title: The siege of Rhodes made a representation by the art of prospective in scenes, and the story sung in recitative musick. At the Cock-pit in Drury Lane.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
publisher: printed by J.M. for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the Anchor, in the Lower-walk in the New-Exchange,
notes: Identified as Wing D341A on reel 1439 of UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproductions of the originals in the Dyce Collection, Victoria and Albert Museum (reel 1846) and in the Harvard University Library (reel 1439).
